CustomField.formula: IF(OR(TEXT(refedge__Account_Request_Status__c) = 'In Progress', TEXT(refedge__Account_Request_Status__c) = 'On Hold', TEXT(refedge__Account_Request_Status__c) = 'Not Started' ), IF(TEXT(refedge__Account_Request_Status__c) = 'In Progress', "In Progress", IF(TEXT(refedge__Account_Request_Status__c) = 'On Hold', "On Hold","Not Started")), IF(ISBLANK(TEXT(refedge__Approval_Status__c)), IF(TEXT(refedge__Account_Request_Status__c) = 'Completed', "Completed", IF(TEXT(refedge__Account_Request_Status__c) = 'No Response',"No Response", IF(TEXT(refedge__Account_Request_Status__c) = 'Unavailable', "Unavailable", IF(TEXT(refedge__Account_Request_Status__c) = 'No Longer Needed', "No Longer Needed", "Give Up")))), TEXT(refedge__Approval_Status__c)) & " - " & TEXT(refedge__Process__c))
CustomField.label: Account Request Status
